mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectSysChckHist Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ CHCK_DT , CHCK_JOB_SECT_CD , CHCK_TGT_SECT_CD , CHCK_CONT , CHCK_RESULT_CD , RM_CONT FROM SYS_CHCK_HIST WHERE 1 = 1
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteSysChckHist Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM SYS_CHCK_HIST WHERE 1 = 1
